articles.title: 8% of all Google Play apps vulnerable to old security bug - ZDNet
articles.description: Devs have not updated a crucial library inside their apps, leaving users exposed to dangerous attacks. Some of the vulnerable apps include Microsoft's Edge browser, Grindr, OKCupid, and Cisco Teams.
